comments.author: Fernando Celibataire
comments.content: This looks like a great salad for a hot summer day!

comments.author: Michelle
comments.content: What a beautiful photo and presentation.

comments.author: Miakoda
comments.content: I find it difficult to imagine how this would taste...interesting line up of ingredients. :)

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: Thanks Dia! I just got a new macro adapter, that was part of why I made this dish, to try it out.

comments.author: Sandi Hemming
comments.content: Are those snap peas?  We don't get English peas.

comments.author: Michael Natkin
comments.content: If I remember right, those were actually English peas that were so tender the shell was tasty too. But you can absolutely do this with sugar snap peas.
